Items.ItemDescription: It probably had seen more combat, parties and women than you ever had.
Looks like it is still usable. Just need to find some gunpowder and a bullet.
You can pay rent for the next month and maybe afford some instant noodles.
A tin can that has Food written on it.
A hat that looks like those from Peaky Blinders.
Yo skibidi, what's the vibe? We ain't ever sliding back here fr. I swear they got wall hacks or something. Tell 'em to chill!
Best thing you can do with this is peel 2 apples. Can't even end your misery with it.
